a.title: Visit the staff email link to access Microsoft Outlook

div.p: Summer school will be held June 1-25, 2020. Additional information including locations, courses offered, start and end times, and enrollment is coming soon.
Kindergarten enrollment and screening has been postponed until further notice.

The BSSD will have its MSHSAA-mandated dead week from July 4-12, 2020 next summer. All high school and middle school athletic teams and activities will be required to take these days off during the summer. Anyone with questions should contact the District Activities Office at 816-874-3200.

div.div: 1801 NW Vesper, Blue Springs, MO 64015 | Phone 816.874.3200 | Fax
